column4: hi everyone, i would require some help. My samsung YP-K3 is not mounting on Ubuntu, is there anything i could do about it, to make it work ?
try enabling mtp mode on your mp3 player
okay, i'll google that, i mean google how i can do that, thank you
the samsung YP-K3 is an MTP device, so this is enabled by default. Atleast that's what i've learned by reading some websites.
